summary: Birthday spent in calm momentum. Fixed two long-standing critical bugs — received peer appreciation. Initiated a conversation with the AI team manager about transitioning, though no immediate openings. Avoided celebration but felt okay. Made focused progress on the SAMStudio app — execution continues. A quiet but foundational day.

wins: Received peer recognition for technical contribution.
Maintained composure and rhythm despite emotional significance of the day.
losses: AI team is currently full — no immediate internal transition possible.
ideas: Keep subtle check-ins with the AI manager to stay top of mind for future openings.
Use birthday week as a checkpoint — refine SAMStudio roadmap with a 90-day lens.

goals: Finish core logging and analytics module for SAMStudio by Sunday.
Prepare lightweight AI portfolio or demos to support future internal shifts.
